data.description:
Our NEW Training Grounds & Leaderboards updates bring the competitiveness you've been waiting for in Swordsman. Compete cross-platform on many different challenges, such as hand-to-hand combat, tatami mat, and archery. Will you try to crack the top 100 leaderboard? 

More on Swordsman: 

Swordsman is a physics-based medieval combat game designed for virtual reality. 

The game features Knights, Vikings, Mongols, Samurai, Pirates, realistic armor physics, epic boss fights and powerful boss weapons, a Kraken, RPG player progression and customization, a Blacksmith, Armorer and Skill Master to help you build a character suited to your playstyle and lots of items to buy and unlock, all in effort to stop the Jötunn from taking over the world. 

The Jötunn has recruited captains from all over the world, giving them godly weapons with which to command powerful armies. He wields seemingly infinite power: Hellfire.

Swordsman also features gameplay modifiers. These will let you change how the core game works in fun and interesting ways. Hardcore enemies, invisible enemies (floating swords), Doomfist (super strength), the ability to slow time down whenever you want and many more.

changelog.change_log:
Major update and two hotfixes consolidated into changelist below


- Ranged Combat AI
- New mode: Archery range (see door by Blacksmith)
- New ranged weapons and ammo types
- New player Archer armor and helmet


- Opening the PS quick menu paused the game and it could not be unpaused
- On map load, players could see under the floor sometimes, before being set to a proper height
- AI could break when parried (and stop performing all actions)
- Purchased arrow types did not show as unlocked (even though they were)
- Archery range tried to return holstered weapons back to original location
- The game frequently crashed for some users in various situations
- Longbow did not stay purchased and would lock when returning to hub
- Ranged AI stood up at the end of Finishers and then died immediately
- The quiver did not hide when the game was paused
- Arrows could get stuck on enemy bows
- Enemies stabbed with a loaded crossbow bolt caused glitches
- Arrows could be used to parry and stagger enemies, as if a regular weapon
- Crossbow could refuse to accept bolts (causing them to vanish)
- Returning to hub from combat maps could spawn you by the archery door
- Player could float out of arenas in Sandbox with 0 gravity
- Jotunn wings did not despawn in Sandbox mode
- Dagger flip stopped working for some users
- Clearing weapons in Sandbox mode could fail to produce H2H enemies
- Zombie heads could suddenly enlarge when cut off
